metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7876 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In libming 0.4.8, a memory exhaustion vulnerability was found in thefunction parseSWF_ACTIONRECORD in util/parser.c, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
